Blast.description: Spindle‑shaped lesions on leaves, neck and panicle, reduces grain filling.
Blast.suggestion: Apply Tricyclazole or use resistant varieties; avoid high humidity circles.

Bacterial_leaf_blight.description: Wilting and drying of leaf tips; yellow streaks expand along leaf margins.
Bacterial_leaf_blight.suggestion: Use copper‑based sprays or seed treatment with Streptocycline.

Sheath_blight.description: Water‑soaked lesions on leaf sheaths near water line.
Sheath_blight.suggestion: Spray Validamycin or apply neem cake compost.

Tungro.reason: Rice Tungro Virus (RTBV + RTSV) vectored by green leafhopper
Tungro.description: Yellow/orange discoloration, stunted growth, poor tillering.
Tungro.suggestion: Use insecticide to control hopper and plant resistant varieties.

False_smut.description: Greenish spore balls replace grains in panicles.
False_smut.suggestion: Spray Carbendazim at booting; maintain plant spacing.

Stem_rust.reason: Fungus Puccinia graminis f. sp. tritici
Stem_rust.description: Red-brown pustules on stems and leaves; reduces yield.
Stem_rust.suggestion: Use resistant cultivars; apply Azoxystrobin fungicide.

Leaf_rust.description: Orange pustules on leaves; lowers photosynthesis.
Leaf_rust.suggestion: Fungicide application with Propiconazole or resistant varieties.

Stripe_rust.description: Yellow stripes of pustules along leaf veins.
Stripe_rust.suggestion: Seed treatment with Tebuconazole; timed spray during flag leaf stage.

Powdery_mildew.description: White powdery growth on leaf surfaces.
Powdery_mildew.suggestion: Spray Sulphur or bio‑fungicide Bacillus subtilis.

Loose_smut.description: Smutted kernels replaced by spores in grain heads.
Loose_smut.suggestion: Treat seed with Carboxin, sow resistant lines.

Northern_leaf_blight.description: Long tan lesions with dark borders on leaves.
Northern_leaf_blight.suggestion: Apply Azoxystrobin or rotate with non‑host crops.

Downy_mildew.description: White/gray mold on leaf undersides; stunted plants.
Downy_mildew.suggestion: Use metal‑based sprays and remove volunteer maize.

Maize_mosaic_virus.suggestion: Control vector with insecticide; plant tolerant hybrids.

Common_rust.description: Reddish-brown pustules on both leaf surfaces.
Common_rust.suggestion: Foliar spray with Azoxystrobin or neem extract.

Charcoal_rot.description: Grey-brown lesions at stem base; ashy-black interior.
Charcoal_rot.suggestion: Soil solarization or apply Trichoderma‑based biofungicide.

Late_blight.description: Water‑soaked lesions on leaves/stems; tuber rot.
Late_blight.suggestion: Spray metalaxyl + mancozeb; remove infected foliage.

Early_blight.description: Target‑like lesions on leaves; premature leaf drop.
Early_blight.suggestion: Apply chlorothalonil or organic compost tea with garlic.

Potato_leafroll_virus.description: Leaf rolling, net necrosis in tubers, stunting.
Potato_leafroll_virus.suggestion: Use virus‑free seed; control aphids; rogue infected plants.

Black_scab.description: Rough, corky spots on tubers' surface.
Black_scab.suggestion: Lower soil pH; apply sulfur; discard infected tubers.

Bacterial_wilt.description: Wilting, yellowing, brown ooze in tubers/roots.
Bacterial_wilt.suggestion: Practice crop rotation; soil sanitation; resistant cultivars.

Early_blight.description: Dark concentric leaf spots; fruit rot.
Early_blight.suggestion: Spray Mancozeb or neem oil every 10 days.

Late_blight.description: Water‑soaked lesions; white mold under leaves.
Late_blight.suggestion: Copper fungicides or copper oxychloride spray.

Bacterial_canker.description: Wilting, cankers on stems, bird’s‑eye spots on fruit.
Bacterial_canker.suggestion: Use disease‑free seeds; apply copper sprays.

Tomato_leaf_curl_virus.description: Leaf curling, thickened veins, stunted growth.

Anthracnose.description: Dark lesions on bolls/stems; boll rot.
Anthracnose.suggestion: Spray Mancozeb; integrate Azotobacter as biocontrol.

Bacterial_blight.description: Water‑soaked spots that become angular and necrotic.

Citrus_canker.description: Raised lesions with oily margins on leaves/fruit.

Citrus_greening.suggestion: Control psyllids; remove infected trees; use disease‑free seedlings.

Brown_rot.suggestion: Use resistant rootstock; copper fungicide Fosetyl‑Al.

Black_spot.suggestion: Apply copper sprays; remove dropped fruit.

Citrus_nematode.suggestion: Use nematicide; clean planting material; increase organic matter.

Black_sigatoka.suggestion: Frequent fungicide spray; remove affected leaves.

Panama_disease.reason: Fungus Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. cubense

Apple_scab.suggestion: Spray Mancozeb or use resistant varieties.

Powdery_mildew.description: White powdery growth on leaves, fruit.

Apple_rust.suggestion: Remove juniper alternate hosts; apply myclobutanil.

Malformation.suggestion: Prune malformed shoots; mites control; fungicide.

Stem_end_rot.description: Black rot at fruit stem end.
